entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
